Keyword.Name: NewCombineVariable
Keyword.Description: New Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable, NewCombineVariable is only different number of parameter with the old one

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine, range input: 2 --> 17

Keyword.Name: GetCurrentDateTimeWithTimeZone
Keyword.Description: Get current Date Time at a specific Time Zone

Param.Name: sTimeFormat
Param.Description: Time format need to get, do not include millisecond

Param.Name: sMillisecondDigit
Param.Description: number of millisecond to get after sNowTime, null mean don't get

Param.Name: sSeparateSign
Param.Description: sign to separate date and time, null mean will not separate

Keyword.Name: CombineVariable
Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Keyword.Name: CopyRenameFile
Keyword.Description: Copy (and/or remane) a file with option replace if exist

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: OVERWRITE(true) to copy and overwrite the existing file

Keyword.Name: LaunchBrowser
Keyword.Description: Launch browser to URL

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Login to AP outsource webpagee

Keyword.Name: GoToSearch
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Search Function

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Search Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: pageSearch_ExecuteSearchAndSort
Keyword.Description: Execute Search Payment line by line from csv Testcase file

Param.Name: sTCFile
Param.Description: Testcase file path need to run update

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser
